name: rest-api
description: ## List of routes: Route | HTTP | Dscription ----- | ---- | ---------- /api/signup | POST | Sign up with new user info /api/signin | POST | Sign in while get an access token based on credentials /api/users | GET | Get all the users info (admin only) /api/users/:id | GET | Get a single user info (admin and authenticated user) /api/users | POST | Create a user (admin only) /api/users/:ud | DELETE | Delete a user (admin only) /api/users/:id | PUT | Update a user with ne info (admin and authenticated user)
